channel.title: FDA approval on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in FDA approval on FinanClub

item.title: AZN
item.description: score:176 Chances: The FDA approval of AstraZeneca’s Fasenra for patients with severe asthma aged six to 11 years presents a strong opportunity for growth in this market segment. Despite investor backlash over high executive pay, AstraZeneca’s continued approval of new drugs and expansion of its product line indicates potential for future success.

item.title: GERN
item.description: score:69 Chances: Geron Corporation’s pipeline candidate, imetelstat, received FDA Committee backing for the treatment of transfusion-dependent anemia in adult patients with low-to-intermediate-1 risk myelodysplastic syndromes, indicating potential for future market approval. Shares of Geron Corporation (GERN) soar after positive news from the FDA’s Oncologic Drugs Advisory Committee, showing investor optimism in the company’s potential drug approvals.

item.title: BMY
item.description: score:239 Chances: Bristol Myers Squibb’s Krazati, in combination with cetuximab, demonstrates clinically meaningful activity as a targeted treatment option for patients with previously treated KRASG12C-mutated colorectal cancer. Bristol Myers wins FDA approval for CAR T cell immunotherapy, Abecma, in earlier lines of treatment for patients with relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma.

item.title: IOVA
item.description: score:-12 Chances: Iovance Biotherapeutics’ revenue is set to grow, indicating potential for increased stock value. The FDA has lifted a partial clinical hold on Iovance’s mid-stage study, showing positive regulatory progress. Risks: Iovance Biotherapeutics reported a net loss of $116.4 million in Q4, reflecting financial risk and potential impact on stock performance.

item.title: GKOS
item.description: score:12 Chances: Glaukos Corporation continues to benefit from a robust product portfolio and favorable clinical trial results. The FDA approval of Glaukos’ iDose TR is likely to reshape glaucoma care, promising proactive and durable treatment. Risks: The insider transaction and sale of shares by the President & COO could raise concerns among investors.
